TopicTitle: You know you've had a big catastrophe when...

Articles.Content: ... the report of the demise of your poor brave Kerbal is found on the 4th page of the 13 page mission report. (Backstory here.)

Nah, just means you landed on the wrong end

You know when I asked my patents as a kid why things had very obvious warning signs they would always respond "because someone did it..... "

Your KSP agency now has to post "This End Up" stickers on all their rockets.
Having 200 objects in orbit out of nowhere is also a pretty good indicator.
I just realized the huge irony with the thread I posted in relation to this one appearing not much earlier. What a coincidence!

I just realized the huge irony with the thread I posted in relation to this one appearing not much earlier. What a coincidence!

Heh, yah. Obviously I should have looped my doomed ship into the Jool system, I could have would up with a dV-free feather-soft landing at Eve.
